mapper.insert: INSERT INTO askdto(pno, askTitle, askContent, askRegDate) VALUES (#{pno}, #{askTitle}, #{askContent}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT askNum, a.pno, askTitle, askContent, askRegDate, p.productName FROM askdto a INNER JOIN productdto p ON a.pno = p.pno WHERE a.pno = #{a.pno} ORDER BY askNum DESC
